bibl.title: Skifskiy roman. [Scythian Novel.]
bibl.note: Ouvrage collectif auquel ont collaboré diverses institutions russes. Table des matières en anglais. - Preface by G.M. BONGARD-LEVIN. - Part One. The Archival Heritage of M. Rostovtzeff. - Part Two. Life of the Scholar: Russia - Great Britain - The United States. - Part Three. Meetings, Friends, Colleagues, Ennemies. - Part Four. The Epistolary Heritage of M. Rostovtzeff. - Part Five. M. Rostovtzeff’s Unpublished Materials (University and Public Letters). - Name Index [en caractères latins et cyrilliques].
